CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 11, 1954, pg. 9, reads: "Talented Teen - Agers - Bishop A. J. Allen congratulates 13-year-old Patricia Miles, said by many to have a voice similar to Marian Anderson, and Andrew Hughey, young virtuoso, on their performance Tuesday evening in Brown Chapel AME Church. These two young people were featured in 'Festival of Music' held there for the benefit of the West Newton Flood Fund. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bishop A. J. Allen shaking hands with Patricia Miles, with Andrew Hughey standing on right, at "Festival of Music" benefit for West Newton Flood Fund, Brown Chapel AME Church, vertical format
